ModMetaData.name: Ceramics Crafting
ModMetaData.author: N7Huntsman
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a variety of ceramics and other materials from across various tech level to the game. Modified for Vanilla Expanded Framework.
this is a port of N7Huntsmans ceramics mod only crafting.
i just modified some parts that are already in 1.3 / Ideology
